ValidationRule.description: Validates the required fields when stage is updated from qualify to proposal.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( TEXT( PRIORVALUE(StageName) ) = 'Qualify' , ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Proposal'), OR( ISBLANK( Program_Name__c ), ISBLANK( Description ), ISBLANK( Amount ), ISBLANK( Client_Budget__c ), ISBLANK( Lead_School__c ), ISBLANK( TEXT( Existing_Relationship__c ) ) , ISBLANK( Revenue_Potential__c ), ISBLANK( TEXT( Financial_Viability__c ) ) , ISBLANK( TEXT( Self_Evaluation__c ) ) , ISBLANK( TEXT( Technical_Capability__c ) ) , ISBLANK( TEXT( QUTeX_Capacity__c ) ) , ISBLANK( TEXT( Faculty_Capacity__c ) ) , ISBLANK( Qualification_Summary__c ) , NOT( Has_Proposal_Opportunity_Role__c ) ) )
